comment.author: 82596826@N03
comment._content:
MkIV Male, Beutepanzer "Heinz" ,Wagen 207, tactical No. "5", of Abteilung 14, knocked out by the French on 1 July 1918 near Fort de la Pompelle, just to the southeast of Reims.

"Heinz" was widely photographed, however this view is quite exceptional, as it shows the rear cross and the tank's number "5"

Another eg, this time a Female:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/8092157131/in/photostream/]
